channel.title: Paranormal Activity 3
channel.description:
I'm currently downloading the movie, does anyone already have seen it? Should I cancel my dl? :p Cuz I saw some comments the movie had like half of the trailer not in it.
trailer: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aCJWNM1a3F8[/youtube]

item.title: Paranormal Activity 3
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:3, topic:419442”][quote author=eballer48 link=topic=521989.msg3794247#msg3794247 date=1319507409]
Its blows, not scary.
Just like 1 and 2.
[/quote]
so u recommend just not wasting dlspace on it?[/quote]

Some people really liked them so I won’t say don’t watch it.

I watched the 2nd only, and it looks just like the 3rd. I was bored the entire movie and they used such cheap tricks.

Read full topic

item.title: Paranormal Activity 3
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:9, topic:419442”][quote author=eballer48 link=topic=521989.msg3794247#msg3794247 date=1319507409]
Its blows, not scary.
Just like 1 and 2.
[/quote]

Tbh, I saw it, made me lol on how unscary it was, 28 weeks later is scarier rofl, even resident evil is more scary then it.

Stop trying to be hard asses. One of you screamed in one part or jumped.[/quote]

orly? someone’s trying to assimilate me? I’m stating that this didn’t scare me, and I’m stating 2 movies That I found were better.

Read full topic
